doc:
Alice Nunn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alice_Nunn 0 Alice Elizabeth Nunn (October 10, 1927 – July 1, 1988) was an American film and theatre actress. She was born in Jacksonville, Florida and died at her apartment in West Hollywood, California. Although she played many roles across her 31-year career, she is primarily remembered for her role as Large Marge, the scary truck driver, in Tim Burton's 1985 film Pee-wee's Big Adventure, which is number 5 on the IFC list of the 25 scariest moments in non-horror film history. Alice_Elizabeth_Nunn ( October_10_,_1927 – July_1_,_1988 ) was an_American_film_and_theatre_actress . She was_born in Jacksonville_,_Florida_and died at her_apartment in West_Hollywood , California . Although she played many_roles across her_31-year_career , she is_primarily_remembered for her_role as Large_Marge , the_scary_truck_driver , in Tim_Burton 's 1985_film Pee-wee 's_Big_Adventure , which is number_5 on the_IFC_list of the_25_scariest_moments in non-horror_film_history .
